name: DEPRAVED (itch) (Donut0265)
description:
DEPRAVED is a Survival Horror game

STORY

You play as Sarah an archaeologist, after a sudden fall at a excavation site examining a strange ruin. You wake up in your tent to a foggy cold forest, late in the night all alone, you feel strange and your head is pounding. Realizing it's getting colder by the minute and no radios or flashlights are working , you must light the torch you found to keep warm, use the compass you have to  explore and also using your new found Ability "Sixth Sense" to find a way to safety while finding anything to keep you from going insane. Find out what happened to your other team members, the past excavation team and escape the forest!

CONTROLS
WASD - Movement
LEFT SHIFT - Speed Walk
C - Crouch
E - Interact
F - Compass/Objective
Q - Sixth Sense
TAB - Change view 3rd-person/ Fixed 1st-person
ESC/P - Pause

UPDATES 

VERSION 1.1
-Health Widget Removed
-Vignette brought down from 0.7 to 0.5
-Fixed Widget Not Being Removed After Torch Burns Out In Light/Burn Radius
-Increased SpeedWalk Time From 20 To 30 Seconds
-Decreased SpeedWalk Cooldown From 7.5 to 5 Seconds

WARNING!!!

"Sixth Sense" Vision may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.

NOTES
The warning is a precaution to whoever has sensitive eyes or is photosensitive, I'm not sure if it can actually cause harm but I know it is bright and does have a decent amount of moving light/Imagery so please be careful, it's better to be safe then sorry!

Also Fixed First-Person is a first person like style like classic DOOM where you can only look left and right but not up and down, It is just something that is for variety and it is playable in that view but I would suggest using the third-person view for finding notes, pick ups and such.

OTHER NOTES
This is my second game I've made with Unreal Engine, This game I believe is unforgiving and is hard depending on how good you are at games, If having Frame Rate issues please try the "Low" Graphics settings in the menu screen, This game also runs in "Full Screen 1920x1080" by Default, so please enjoy and please leave any Comments or Constructive Criticism/Feedback! Thank you and Thanks for playing!
